snippet.title: 2013 NBA schedule: Kings, Blazers victorious on the road
snippet.description:
2013 NBA schedule: Kings, Blazers victorious on the road by Matt Conner on Dec 31 2013, 5:31p
The Blazers stayed hot Tuesday, overcoming Kevin Durant's 37 points to beat the Thunder, 98-94. Sacramento found success of its own, upsetting the Rockets, 110-106.

snippet.title: Portland Trail Blazers hoping offense masks defense
snippet.description:
Portland Trail Blazers hoping offense masks defense by Drew Garrison on Dec 31 2013, 11:46a
Terry Stotts has the Trail Blazers' offense purring, leaning on his past to create a fresh future in Portland. Can their perimeter-heavy attack lead them to a title?
